entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
